components.description:
An emoji version of the digit 0, created via a variation selector.

Not given emoji presentation on Apple or Microsoft devices, or on platforms such as Facebook and Twitter / X. Microsoft did previously support this emoji within Windows 8 and Windows 10.
components.title: Digit Zero

components.description: An emoji component character that may appear as a square with rounded corners on certain platforms.
components.title: Combining Enclosing Keycap

description: The number 0 on a square with rounded corners, designed to look like a keycap.
title: Keycap Digit Zero

version.description: The following characters we added to Unicode in 1999, with most being given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: Keycap Digit Zero was approved as part of Unicode 3.0 in 1999 and added to Emoji 3.0 in 2016. Copy and paste this emoji: Copy http://emojipedia.org/keycap-digit-zero/
emoji_net_data.name: keycap: 0

bn:00095886a: Indicating the absence of any or all units under consideration

bn:00098606a: Having a tint or hue similar to the colour blue.
Of the color intermediate between green and violet; having a color similar to that of a clear unclouded sky- Helen Hunt Jackson
Having the pure color of a clear sky; the primary color between green and violet in the visible spectrum, an effect of light with a wavelength between 450 and 500 nm.

bn:00106058a: Limited or below average in number or quantity or magnitude or extent

bn:00086770v: To select a number, or to call someone, on a telephone.
Operate a dial to select a telephone number
To enter numbers on a telephone or mobile device in order to make a phone call.
To select a number on a telephone.

bn:00085859v: To determine the number (of objects in a group).
Determine the number or amount of

bn:00007146n: Wiktionary, the free dictionary, has entries for: aught cipher duck love nada naught nil nought o ought zero zilch zip There are several names for the number 0 in English, and concomitant names for the decades where the tens column contains the number 0.
Is the absence of everything or a void.
Nothing is a pronoun denoting the absence of anything.
A zero value in several branches of mathematics
The cardinal number that denotes no quantity or amount at all.
The value of a magnitude corresponding to the cardinal number zero.
Pronoun denoting the absence of anything
In mathematics, the word null means of or related to having zero members in a set or a value of zero.

Nothingness denotes the nonexistence of something or of anything specifiable, the state of nothing, the property of having nothing, or of being no thing; in nontechnical uses, "nothing" denotes things lacking importance, interest, value, relevance, or significance.

bn:00058285n: A concept of quantity involving zero and units
Mathematical object used to count, label, and measure
A number is one of several related types of mathematical objects.
A member of one of several classes: natural numbers, integers, rational numbers, real numbers, complex numbers, quaternions.
A set of numerals for representing numbers.

bn:03629990n: A keycap is a small plastic cover placed over the keyswitch of a computer keyboard.

bn:00000004n: 0 is both a number and the numerical digit used to represent that number in numerals.
A mathematical element that when added to another number yields the same number
The numeric symbol that represents the cardinal number zero.
A grouping of three digits in a number, especially when delimited by commas or periods:
Not any quantity of number; zero; the score of no points in a game.

note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
